data.title: Kuinan Wei
data.meta_description: Kuinan Wei focuses on the areas of mergers and acquisitions, private equity, and venture capital, with experience spanning the full range of M&A and investment activities, including cross-border M&A, joint ventures, disposals and divestitures, public company transactions including take-private transactions, as well as growth capital investments.
data.text:
With more than a decade of experience, Kuinan advises international investors entering the Chinese market and assists Chinese investors in global ventures. She possesses deep familiarity with China’s investment environment, regulatory landscape, and the challenges faced by foreign investors. Kuinan advises global investors—whether financial or strategic—exploring the Chinese market on investment structures, local solutions, transaction terms, regulatory issues, and exit strategies. She also facilitates connections between Chinese investors and the global investment community, spanning the United States, European Union, Middle East, Southeast Asia, and Africa, regularly advising Chinese investors on financial investments, strategic acquisitions, greenfield investments, and forming partnerships with international industry players.

Kuinan represents a diverse client base including private equity and venture capital funds, sovereign wealth funds, financial institutions, asset managers, emerging growth companies, multinational corporations, and large state-owned conglomerates. Her sharp business acumen allows her to understand clients’ core business needs. She remains abreast of investment trends and has experience across various industries such as technology, consumer goods, logistics, biotech, healthcare, automotive, manufacturing, energy, and resources.

She is fluent in Mandarin and English.
